channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Book Review: The Making of Modern Corporate Finance
item.description: Donald Chew delivers a love letter to unfettered capitalism and the financial system that oils the gears of commerce.

item.title: House Republicans introduce bill to erase USAID
item.description: Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Chip Roy introduced legislation Friday that would abolish the beleaguered U.S. Agency for International Development.

item.title: The last straw from Trump: Out with paper, back to plastic

item.title: Investigators are starting to arrest high-tech international thieves targeting US superstar athletes like Patrick Mahomes
item.description: “These individuals seem to be the alleged tip of the iceberg,” said Kenneth Parker, the U.S. Attorney in southern Ohio.

item.title: What’s the Winning Ingredient in M&A? The Answer Lies in Due Diligence
item.description: The days of due diligence as a box-checking exercise are over.

item.title: New bird flu variant found in Nevada dairy cows has experts sounding alarms: ‘We have never been closer to a pandemic from this virus’
item.description: Dairy herds in Nevada have been infected by a version of the H5N1 bird flu not previously seen in cows, putting virologists on high alert.

item.title: History Warns Us About Cabinet Members Like RFK Jr.
item.description: If RFK is confirmed, he is likely to fail for reasons similar to those for past political choices for the cabinet.

item.title: Beyond the Hype: Do Hedge Funds Deliver Value?
item.description: Skill and alpha are scarce and difficult to obtain in the hedge fund market.

item.title: Indiana District Approves Pornographic Book In Class, Bans Requirement For Parental Consent

item.title: Trump Signals He’ll Fight For Reality At UNICEF With Motion To Nuke DEI And Trans Ideology
item.description: Though the trans- and DEI-focused amendments failed to pass, they demonstrated that the Trump administration intends to fight on all fronts.

item.title: Chew on This: Will the Smithsonian Hide Its DEI Program, or Ditch It for Good?
item.description: Plus: Raphael’s Mary Magdalene , earrings fit for a Greek goddess, and a house museum gets its woodwork back.

item.title: Why RFK Jr. Must Restrict the Abortion Pill
item.description: Mifepristone is indisputably the single biggest driver of abortion in America today.

item.title: The Super Bowl team Trump may not be rooting for on Sunday
item.description: Is President Donald Trump taking sides when it comes to Sunday's Super Bowl between the Kansas City Chiefs and the Philadelphia Eagles?

item.title: House Democrats demand end to 'illegal' work stoppage at CFPB
item.description: Dozens of House Democrats are alarmed by the Trump administration's next target in its cost-cutting quest: the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

item.title: USAID Funneled Nearly $800 Million To ‘Gender Transformative’ Global Censorship Group
item.description: USAID funneled $799 million to a group that launched a global censorship platform and pushed radical gender ideology.

item.title: Did Real Assets Provide an Inflation Hedge When Investors Needed it Most?
item.description: Real assets' first test in modern times started in 2021. Did they perform as hoped?

item.title: Elon Musk says he doesn’t want to buy TikTok’s US business
item.description: “I have not put in a bid for TikTok,” Musk said. “I don’t have any plans for what would I do if I had TikTok.”

item.title: Alaska lawmakers officially oppose Trump's push to change Denali to Mount McKinley
item.description: The Alaska Legislature wants President Trump to rethink his order renaming North America's tallest peak.

item.title: NCAA Had The Power To Keep Men Out Of Women’s Sports This Whole Time
item.description: It's about time we have a president who is actually listening to the everyday victims of men in ladyface.

item.title: Trump Will Never Understand Sharia Supremacism
item.description: He apparently believes that the Gaza issue can be solved while ignoring the dominant fact on the ground.

item.title: Musk’s DOGE team now seeks access to Treasury’s accounting data
item.description: Musk will dispatch a DOGE team to Parkersburg, West Virginia, where it will gain read-only access to the US government’s central accounting system.
